verbs.description: [ARG1: TODAY 's Savannah Guthrie and Hoda Kotb] [V: are] [ARG2: on the TIME 100 list of most influential people] , and now Savannah joins Megyn Kelly TODAY to talk about Wednesday night 's TIME 100 gala ( at which Hoda carried her accessories in a Ziploc bag ) .
